Description: Aisan Industry Co. Ltd., an Obu, Japan-based company, agreed to plead guilty and to pay a criminal fine of $6.86 million for its role in a price-fixing conspiracy involving electronic throttle bodies sold in the United States and elsewhere.

NAICS Translation: 336399: All Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
